question: When was the nearest zoo from Kona Cloud Forest - Guided Walking Tours, Kailua-Kona, HI opened?
sql:
SELECT * FROM pois
WHERE tourism = 'zoo'
ORDER BY  geometry <-> ST_GeomFromText('POINT (-155.946499 19.706114)',4326)::geography ASC
LIMIT 1;

answers.multihop_long_answer: Panaewa Rainforest Zoo Date opened: September 1978

[2].display_name: Kona Cloud Forest - Guided Walking Tours, Kailua-Kona, HI

poi.poi_name: Kona Cloud Forest - Guided Walking Tours
poi.description: The Only Cloud Forest in the United States. Three Hour Guided Walking Tours weather permitting. All tours are offered through our educational non profit Painted Trees of Hawaii. All donations are 100% tax deductible. All tours are by appointment only.
